article_title: As U.S. Pharmacy Sales Slow, Walgreens Says Rite Aid Deal On Track

article_metadata.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance is improving margins through cost-cutting to combat a slow U.S. prescription market that led in part to its acquisition of Rite Aid, a deal Walgreens expects to close later this year.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance is improving margins through cost-cutting to combat a slow U.S. prescription market that led in part to its acquisition of Rite Aid, a deal Walgreens expects to close later this year.
